revised_title: Influence of Pressure on Gaseous Combustion and Explosion Limits
tldr: This study investigates the influence of pressure on the combustion and explosion limits of various gas-air mixtures. The authors found that the explosion ranges of these mixtures generally widen with increasing pressure. However, in some cases, a moderate pressure increase may narrow the explosion ranges. The findings provide valuable insights into the behavior of combustible gas mixtures under different pressure conditions.
scientific_discipline: Chemistry > Chemical kinetics and reaction dynamics
